name: Mediacom Communications Corporation
description: Mediacom Communications Corporation is a leading telecommunications provider in the United States, specializing in delivering high-speed internet, digital television, and phone services to underserved communities. Founded in 1995 by Rocco B. Commisso, Mediacom has grown to become the fifth-largest cable operator in the U.S., with a commitment to bridging the digital divide in rural and suburban areas. The company offers a variety of services tailored to meet the needs of its customers, including a range of internet packages featuring speeds up to 1 Gbps, over 170 channels of digital TV, and reliable phone services. Mediacom is particularly focused on providing exceptional customer service and innovative solutions, such as its advanced TiVo® digital video recording system that enhances the viewing experience. The company is also dedicated to community involvement, supporting local initiatives and educational programs to foster digital literacy. As the demand for high-speed connectivity continues to rise, Mediacom is committed to expanding its network and improving service quality to empower individuals and businesses alike in a digital-first world.

seo.meta_title: Mediacom Communications Corporation | High-Speed Internet & TV Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Mediacom Communications Corporation, a top provider of high-speed internet, digital television, and phone services in the U.S. Learn about our commitment to customer service and community support.

faq.question: What services does Mediacom offer?
faq.answer: Mediacom offers high-speed internet, digital television, and phone services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Mediacom?
faq.answer: Rocco B. Commisso is the CEO of Mediacom Communications Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Mediacom headquartered?
faq.answer: Mediacom is headquartered in Bloomington, Minnesota, USA.

faq.question: What is Mediacom's commitment to communities?
faq.answer: Mediacom is dedicated to community involvement and supports local initiatives to enhance digital literacy.
